environment_parameters.name: Auto-generate Stimuli
environment_parameters.description: Controls whether EEPS generates stimuli not identified in the experiment setup. For example, if a phase of an experiment only trains two out of four classes, should comparison stimuli be created for the other two classes

agent_parameters.name: Symmetric NE
agent_parameters.description: True or False; if True: we use the localized network (adoubly stochastic matrix) and Symmetric Network Enhancement (SNE); if False: we use the probability matrix and Directed Network Enhancement (DNE)

agent_parameters.name: 𝛽ₕ
agent_parameters.description: float >=0, probabilities are proportional to exp(beta_h*h_value). is used for converting h-values to probabilities during training and to generate the Network enhancement input

agent_parameters.name: 𝛽ₜ
agent_parameters.description: float >=0, controls agent’s function in a trial at test phase (derived relation)

agent_parameters.name: K
agent_parameters.description: parameter for symmetry relation. K=1 means that the relations are bidirectional and network is symmetric at the end of the training phase.

agent_parameters.name: γ
agent_parameters.description: float between 0 and 1, controls forgetting/damping of h-values

agent_parameters.name: Use NE During Training
agent_parameters.description: If true, network enhancement will occur when an agent progresses to a new phase during training

affinity_parameters.name: Graph Style
affinity_parameters.description:
Controls the appearance of the graph visualisation display. 
 The options are: 
 1. Mutlipartite: based on Mofrad et al.'s (2020) design, arranges stimuli in columns of classes and rows of forms. 
 2. Community: displays

affinity_parameters.name: Normalise Weights
affinity_parameters.description: If true, weights are normalised in the visualizations between 1 and 0. If false, weights remain as their value in the EEPS agent's clip space

affinity_parameters.name: Community Creation Approach
affinity_parameters.description: If graph style is set to community, which community detection method should be utilised

affinity_parameters.name: Use softmax transition probability for edge weight
affinity_parameters.description: If true, the weights in the visualization are calculated using the softmax transition probability, rather than the agent's weights in their clip space

affinity_parameters.name: Use Heatmap Colors for Edges
affinity_parameters.description: If true, edges in the agent's clip_space will be colored by strength as per the relations in the heatmap

affinity_parameters.name: Minimum Edge Visibility
affinity_parameters.description: Determines the minumum alpha value of edges in the network visualisation

affinity_parameters.name: Save as Animation
affinity_parameters.description:
Controls whether Affinity saves the development of the agent's network as an animation in mp4 or gif format 
 WARNING: This will cause a significant lag at the end of the experiment
